bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for DC Microgrids for Rural and Remote Electricity Access Applications
IEEE Draft Standard for DC Microgrids for Rural and Remote Electricity Access Applications

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard covers the design and operation of a dc microgrid for rural or remote applications based on extra low voltage dc to reduce cost and simplify stability. Such microgrids are typically operated without connecting to a nation's electric power system and are referred to as stand-alone microgrids.
